name: Fushimi Inari Shrine
description: Famous for its thousands of red torii gates leading up a mountain trail.

name: Shibuya Crossing
description: The world's busiest pedestrian crossing and an iconic cityscape.

name: Mount Fuji
description: Japan’s tallest mountain and an iconic natural wonder.

name: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove
description: A magical path through towering green bamboo.

name: Himeji Castle
description: Japan’s most spectacular samurai castle, preserved from feudal times.

name: Nara Deer Park
description: Home to friendly wild deer that bow for treats.

name: Tokyo Skytree
description: One of the tallest towers in the world with amazing views.

name: Osaka Dotonbori
description: Vibrant nightlife with neon lights, street food, and fun.

name: Okinawa Beaches
description: White sand beaches and turquoise waters, perfect for relaxing.

name: Aokigahara Forest
description: A quiet, dense forest at the base of Mt. Fuji.

name: Hiroshima Peace Memorial
description: A tribute to the past and hope for peace.

name: Nikko Toshogu Shrine
description: An ornate shrine dedicated to Tokugawa Ieyasu.

name: Hakone Onsen
description: Famous for its hot springs and mountain views.

name: Sapporo Snow Festival
description: Winter wonderland of snow sculptures and fun.

name: Naoshima Art Island
description: Island filled with modern art museums and installations.
